basicInformation.aboutMe: Hi, I'm Simon, seasoned Full Stack Web Developer with UI/UX design experience. My focus is building unique and engaging user experiences with the latest and greatest technologies. I believe in using the most appropriate tools, languages and frameworks to get things done. Currently, I am delving into devops and workflow automation and to that end, I have created 2 NPM packages that allow you to easily scaffold Python-based Full Stack Web applications.
basicInformation.aboutSite: The purpose of this site to showcase the my works as a Full Stack Developer.

sectionSummaries.description: Provides an overview of my IDE setup, preferred terminal emulator and other developer-related preferences.
Provides a collection of resources I have used to learn full stack web development and development in general.
Showcases the skills I have acquired over time and what they can potentially be used for.
Showcases the work that I have done in this program as well as in my professional career. This section will also include open-source projects that I have worked on.

projects.name: SN - Portfolio (this site)
projects.description: Portfolio website that showcases understanding of building and using a component library for React as well as implementing automated testing and pipelines

projects.name: Giffaroni
projects.description: A React project that utilizes the Giffy API to search for and display awesome gifs a user searches for as well as showing gifs that are trending

projects.name: SnackerRank
projects.description: Introducing SnackerRank, the ultimate snack ranking website. View and comment on snacks in various categories. This project utilizes PHP, PDO and MySQL.

skills.description: This section provides an overview of the skills, languages and frameworks and tools that I have proficiency with.

programmingLanguages.description: These are the programming languages that I use regularly ordered by most to least used.

data.name: TypeScript
data.description: A statically typed superset of JavaScript, Typescript extends JavaScript by providing additional tools and features with the aim to improve code quality, readability and maintainability.

data.name: JavaScript
data.description: A high-level programming language that is an essential part of web development, enabling interactive and dynamic content in web browsers.

data.name: Python
data.description: A high-level, interpreted programming language known for its readability, simplicity, and versatility. It supports multiple programming paradigms, including procedural, object-oriented, and functional programming

data.name: Ruby
data.description: A dynamic, open-source programming language renowned for its simplicity and productivity, with an elegant syntax that is natural to read and easy to write.

data.name: PHP
data.description: A widely-used, open-source scripting language especially suited for web development and can be embedded into HTML. Known for its simplicity and speed, PHP enables developers to create dynamic and interactive websites and applications efficiently.

libraries.description: Things that allow for the building of more robust applications

data.name: Pandas
data.description: A powerful, open-source data manipulation and analysis library for Python, widely used in data science and machine learning.

tools.description: Things to enhance the workflow as a developer

data.name: StorybookJS
data.description: An open-source tool for developing, documenting, and testing UI components in isolation for React, Vue, Angular, and other frameworks

data.name: Github Actions
data.description: A powerful CI/CD tool integrated directly into GitHub, enabling developers to automate, customize, and manage software development workflows within their repositories

data.name: Docker
data.description: Docker is a platform that enables developers to automate the deployment, scaling, and management of applications using containerization.

resources.description: This page is a collection of learn resources and materials that have aided me on my journey to becoming a Full Stack Developer.

content.description: Tutorial sites for learning various programming languages, frameworks and UI design

data.name: freeCodeCamp
data.description: A non-profit organization that offers a comprehensive, accessible online platform for learning web development and programming. It provides a structured curriculum covering a wide range of topics including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, front-end and back-end development, data visualization, and more.

data.name: Dev.to
data.description: An inclusive online community platform for software developers to share knowledge, collaborate, and learn from each other. It features user-generated content such as articles, tutorials, and discussions on a wide array of topics related to software development, programming languages, frameworks, and industry trends.

content.description: Websites that showcase UI & web design

data.name: Dribbble
data.description: A vibrant online community and platform for designers to showcase their work, gain inspiration, and connect with other creatives. It serves as a portfolio and networking site where designers from various fields, including graphic design, web design, illustration, and UI/UX, can share their projects and receive feedback.

developerSetup.description: Welcome to the dev shelf! Here you'll find the list of tools and technologies that empower me as a developer. These tools help me build, debug and deploy high-quality code efficiently.

content.description: The tools I use when writing code or working with databases.

tools.name: Jest
tools.description: A JavaScript-based testing framework used for testing JavaScript/Typescript applications

tools.name: MariaDB
tools.description: A traditional SQL database widely used for web applications

tools.name: MongoDB
tools.description: A NoSQL database that is highly flexible and scalable.

tools.name: Docker
tools.description: A powerful tool for creating, deploying and managing containerized applications

tools.name: GitHub Actions
tools.description: An automation tool that allows you to build, test and deploy code on GitHub

tools.name: ESLint
tools.description: A powerful tool for identifying and fixing problems in JavaScript/Typescript code.
features: Ensures high quality of JavaScript / Typescript
